title: Educatie pentru lideri
description: Based on his experience at Stanford and Harvard, Sebastian analyzes the Romanian educational system, which he believes is still stuck in the communist paradigm. From his point of view, it is all about a way of thinking that has formed over time in our subconscious and is very well transposed by a phrase often heard in Romania: it would have been too beautiful. The challenges of today require authentic leadership that must be trained by a system adapted to the requirements of the 21st century.
author: Sebastian Burduja
